document.full_text: thousands of cocoa farmers who fled their fields during five months of conflict in ivory coast are too afraid of ethnic reprisals to go home, and many fear their plantations are either looted or rotting.
document.title: thousands of ivorian cocoa farmers fear going home
lines_and_colors: thousands of cocoa farmers who fled their fields during five months of conflict in ivory coast are too afraid of ethnic reprisals to go home, and many fear their plantations are either looted or rotting.
